resources.string: Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Face detector dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
Click "Read Barcode" to read a barcode
There are many kinds of plastics. For recycling purposes they are grouped into 7 different categories. Tap a category to learn more about it.

Number: 1
Name: PETE or PET
Recyclable: Yes
Characteristics: Usually clear, often used in pop and water bottles
Recycled Into: Totes,Carpet,Paneling,Fiber,Fleece

Number: 2
Name: HDPE
Recyclable: Yes
Characteristics: Usually not clear, used in milk jugs, yogurt containers, juice bottles
Recycled Into: Pens,Fencing,Recycling Containers

Number: 3
Name: V or PVC
Recyclable: Yes (in some places)
Characteristics: Used in Shampoo Bottles, windows, clear food packaging
Recycled Into: Paneling, flooring, decks

Number: 4
Name: LDPE
Recyclable: Yes
Characteristics: Used in squeezable bottles, shopping bags, bread bags
Recycled Into: Trash bags, trash cans, plastic envelopes

Number: 5
Name: PP
Recyclable: Yes
Characteristics: Used in yogurt containers, ketchup bottles, medicine bottles
Recycled Into: Brooms, ice scrapers, bicycle racks

Number: 6
Name: Styrofoam
Recyclable: No
Characteristics: Used in egg cartons, meat trays, disposable cups and plates
Recycled Into: egg cartons, foam packing, insulation

Number: 7
Name: Other
Recyclable: No
Characteristics: Plastics that don't fit into other categories
Recycled Into: Plastic lumber and other custom-made products
